A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly\, I was pretty disappointed in The Last Jedi.  Don't get me wrong\, there were really great parts.  The themes about the force were good\, the ending was really good.  As a whole\, the movie wasn't great.  The first half of the movie was paced very awkwardly. There were way too many Marvel-like comic relief moments.  The Finn/Rose subplot was hardly conducive to the story and actually pretty distracting.  Too many forced supporting characters that we don't care or know enough about.  It felt like they stepped slightly outside the lines of the Star Wars Universe at times.  All of this negative stuff being said\, I did enjoy the movie and was entertained.  However I left the theater disappointed\, because I know there was a lot more potential.
